text:
Company: Fuller-Moses

Job Type: Inspector

About Us:
Fuller-Moses is a leading inspection services company dedicated to delivering high-quality results to our clients. We are committed to creating an inclusive environment where everyone can thrive.

Job Description:
We are seeking a detail-oriented and organized Inspector to join our team. As an Inspector, you will be responsible for conducting thorough inspections of materials, equipment, and facilities to ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations.

Responsibilities:

 Conduct regular inspections of materials, equipment, and facilities to identify defects or non-compliance
 Document inspection results and report findings to management
 Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement corrective actions
 Develop and maintain strong relationships with clients and stakeholders

Qualifications and Experience:

 2+ years of experience in inspection or a related field
 Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
 Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
 Ability to work independently and as part of a team

Perks and Benefits:
We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $60,000 to $80,000 USD, based on your experience and skills. We also offer a comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, and vision insurance, 401(k) matching, and paid time off.
